member.summary: The item exists in the workspace, but will now be deleted.

member.summary: Occurs from a Get operation on an item that does not currently exist in the current workspace.

member.summary: Replaces an item that already exists in the current workspace.

member.summary: Files or folders still exist in the source directory. Usually occurs when you try to delete a source directory folder that is not empty.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.VersionControl.Client.OperationStatus.SourceWritable
member.summary: The existing file is writable. Usually occurs during an operation, such as a rename, and the existing file was not read-only when it was expected to be read-only.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.VersionControl.Client.OperationStatus.TargetIsDirectory
member.summary: The target is a directory and not a file. Usually occurs in an attempt to get a file to a given path, but a directory exists at the destination with the same name as the requested file.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.VersionControl.Client.OperationStatus.TargetLocalPending
member.summary: There is already a pending change on the local target item. Can occur during an unshelve operation.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.VersionControl.Client.OperationStatus.TargetWritable
member.summary: The destination file is writable. Usually occurs during an operation, such as a rename, and the existing file is not read-only when it was expected to be read-only.

member.name: F:Microsoft.TeamFoundation.VersionControl.Client.OperationStatus.UnableToRefresh
member.summary: Unable to update an item because of a pending edit on the item. Usually occurs during a forced fetch of an item, for example using get /force, but fails because of the pending edit.
